name: Ah Forst Whalk
description:
This game was made for Scorpy's Spooky Halloween Game Jam 2021 over the course of little over a week. It is NOT a walking sim.

In it you walk through a forst and nothing bad happens ever and everyhting is cool and hummen dog is there and hungry happy yeay : )



ASSET SOURCES:
 -  Clay texture provided courtesy of Kitet
 -  Wooden Door and Wire Fence textures sourced from free-to-use stock photos
 -  Wolf Howl SFX taken from freesounds.org 
 -  Music Samples taken from Zelda CD-i Ganon and that one toy that says skin
 -  Various Required Jam Assets
 -  SFX made possible by the Haunted PS1 Render Pipeline

CONTROLS:
 -  WASD to move
 -  Mouse to look around
 -  SHIFT to run
